sentence: but that would only be the case if we don’t get another variant that eludes the immune response.” In the end, Fauci was unclear what the future holds for COVID-19, concluding, “The answer is: We do not know.” The doctor who has not only advised President Joe Biden but has placed himself at the forefront of the pandemic has come under fire recently with Republican Representative Jim Jordan from Ohio saying they would investigate Fauci if the GOP wins in the 2022 midterm election.
author: DrewBerquist.com
title: Fauci Suggests World Is In Phase One Of Five In COVID-19 Pandemic

sentence: Rep. title: Rep. Jordan to Newsmax: GOP Will Investigate Hunter Biden If House Is Won
